Nightlight:

"I'm glad that you ok, Aerotaur"said Nightlight while she hugged 
him"I felt scared when you fell in stasis... I felt very scared"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>        He looks over his shoulder and smiles.  "Hi Nightlight."  He 
quickly 
> walks over to her and gives her a hug. "I feel better than I've 
felt in...  I 
> can't remember when I've felt this good."
